name: ASTRA'S CRYSTALS
description:
This is the story of a human with fox-like features named Astra, who had her village attacked. Her brother Sur was kidnapped along with some regenerative crystals that were in the possession of this species. Astra decides to go on a mission to recover her brother and the crystals, but she will have to face something dangerous. • Puzzles • Interactables • Obstacles • Aerial and Ground Enemies • Emotional Story • Unique Aesthetic
PC GAMEPAD GAME DESIGNER/MANAGER/ASTRA'S VOICE - Ana Almeida GAME ARTIST - Luis Sebastião GAME DEVELOPER - André Tomaz NARRATOR'S VOICE - Pedro Fernandes
